title: Investigation on the coordination between methylpyridine additives and the [Cu(dmp)2]2+/+ redox couple and its improvement towards the stability of the dye-sensitized solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2256-2264
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE00983A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vinh Son Nguyen, Kala Kannankutty, Yu-Hsuan Chen, Ding-Cheng Wang, Chen-Yu Yeh, Tzu-Chien Wei
The position of the methyl group in methylpyridine derivatives plays an important role in the copper(II) coordination mechanism and their electrochemical properties relate to the regeneration process of [Cu(dmp)2]2+ at the counter electrode/electrolyte interfaces.
